format: C++ (CXX) with source code in *.cpp files
description: The file appears to be a JSON compilation database (`compile_commands.json`) listing the compilation commands for multiple C++ source files related to the AppGateway plugin in a larger project. It references source files such as `AppGateway.cpp`, `AppGatewayImplementation.cpp`, `AppGatewayResponderImplementation.cpp`, `Resolver.cpp`, and `Module.cpp`, which are part of the plugin implementation for a software gateway component.

classes.name: AppGateway
classes.description: Main class representing the AppGateway plugin, responsible for handling plugin lifecycle, configuration, and interaction with the framework.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin, setting up necessary resources and state.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Cleans up resources when the plugin is deactivated.
